name: Market Research & Competitive Analysis
description: Comprehensive workflow for conducting market research and competitive analysis for new products or services

nodes.title: Market Research
nodes.description: Research the target market, identify key trends, customer demographics, and market size. Focus on current market conditions and growth opportunities.

nodes.title: Competitor Analysis
nodes.description: Identify main competitors, analyze their products, pricing strategies, marketing approaches, and market positioning. Gather data on their strengths and weaknesses.

nodes.title: Data Analysis & Insights
nodes.description: Analyze the market research and competitor data to identify patterns, opportunities, and threats. Provide strategic insights and recommendations.

nodes.title: Strategic Report
nodes.description: Create a comprehensive market analysis report with executive summary, key findings, competitive landscape overview, and strategic recommendations.

nodes.title: Final Review & Validation
nodes.description: Review the market analysis report for accuracy, completeness, and strategic value. Validate recommendations and ensure all data sources are properly cited.
